author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CONDITIONS BEGINNING TO DETERIORATE IN SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...1200 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...CONDITIONS BEGINNING TO DETERIORATE IN SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...1200 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 12:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 28.3, -92.3
 with movement NE at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 976 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.
